name: The 7th Int'l Conference on Acoustics, Vibration and Noise Control
content: The 7th Int'l Conference on Acoustics, Vibration and Noise Control (CAVNC 2024) will be held from August 9-11, 2024 in Chengdu, China. This Conference will cover issues on Acoustics, Acoustical Engineering, Vibration and Noise Control, Noise Impacts, Noise Control Engineering, etc. It dedicates to creating a stage for exchanging the latest research results and sharing the advanced research methods. CAVNC 2024 will be an important and reliable platform for inspiring international and interdisciplinary exchange at the forefront of Acoustics, Vibration and Noise Control. The Conference will bring together academicians, engineers, educators and policy-makers from all over the world, and we hope that you will take this opportunity to join us for academic exchange and visit the city of Chengdu.
